message: Hey Guys - I'm a designer that's going to have some free time during the next few months. If anyone needs design help on a project for g0v -> can DM me.

data.message: Oh wow I feel like nothing ever 'not' need a designer!

Please come to g0v hackathon on Sep. 16. The registration opens on Aug. 28 12:00 pm UTC+8.  This time will be more friendly to foreigners because of Civic Tech Fest. We will have volunteers to help do summary translation during project introductions.
https://g0v-jothon.kktix.cc/events/g0v-hackath26n

now is open for registration now
